ingredients.ingredient: 2 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix

cookingTips: No browning needed - slow cooker handles everything
Cook on low 8-10 hours for maximum tenderness
Gravy forms naturally from soup and roast juices
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Emphasize the convenience of minimal prep and the importance of low-and-slow cooking for tender results.
